primary_points.title: Number of points in primary dither pattern
primary_points.description: Number of points in FGS primary dither pattern. Possible values are: 1-25.

subpixel_total_points.title: Number of points in subpixel dither pattern
subpixel_total_points.description: Number of points in FGS subpixel dither pattern. Possible values are: 1, 2, 4.

pattern_size.title: Primary dither pattern size
pattern_size.description: NIRCam or NIRISS dither pattern size that indicates the dither point distribution for the INTRASCA pattern type. It is included when an FGS External Calibration dither is in parallel with either NIRCam Engineering Imaging or NIRISS External Calibration.
pattern_size.misc: for NIRCam Eng Imaging/FGS Ext Cal and NIRISS Ext Cal/FGS Ext Cal dithers; set by SDP to dms_dithers_view.dither_size for NIRCam or dms_dithers_view.pattern_size for NIRISS

primary_type.title: Primary dither pattern type
primary_type.description: This value can be either a NIRCam primary dither pattern type (included when an FGS External Calibration dither is in parallel with NIRCam Engineering Imaging with possible values: FULL, FULLBOX, INTRAMODULE, INTRAMODULEBOX, INTRAMODULEX, INTRASCA, SUBARRAY_DITHER, WFSC, NONE) or a NIRISS primary dither pattern type (included when an FGS External Calibration dither is in parallel with NIRISS External Calibration with possible values: AMI, IMAGING, MIMF, and WFSS).
primary_type.misc: for NIRCam Eng Imaging/FGS Ext Cal and NIRISS Ext Cal/FGS Ext Cal dithers; set by SDP to dms_dithers_view.primary_dither_type for NIRCam or dms_dithers_view.pattern_type for NIRISS

primary_dither_type.title: Primary dither points and packing
primary_dither_type.description: NIRCam primary dither specification with number of points and possible point packing, included when an FGS External Calibration dither is in parallel with NIRCam Engineering Imaging.
primary_dither_type.misc: for NIRCam Eng Imaging/FGS Ext Cal dither; set by SDP to dms_dithers_view.primary_dithers for NIRCam

small_grid_pattern.title: Name of small grid dither pattern
small_grid_pattern.description: NIRCam name of the small grid dither pattern, included when an FGS External Calibration dither is in parallel with NIRCam Engineering Imaging.
small_grid_pattern.misc: for NIRCam Eng Imaging/FGS Ext Cal dither; set by SDP to dms_dithers_view.small_grid_dithers for NIRCam

subpixel_pattern.title: Subpixel dither pattern type
subpixel_pattern.description: NIRCam subpixel dither pattern type, included when an FGS External Calibration dither is in parallel with NIRCam Engineering Imaging.
subpixel_pattern.misc: for NIRCam Eng Imaging/FGS Ext Cal dither; set by SDP to dms_dithers_view.subpixel_dither_type|pps_to_scsb_translation| for NIRCam
